esqlQuery.esql:
FROM metrics-elastic_agent.*beat-default
| WHERE data_stream.dataset LIKE "elastic_agent.*beat"
| STATS 
  events_dropped_max = max(to_long(beat.stats.libbeat.pipeline.events.dropped)),
  events_dropped_min = min(to_long(beat.stats.libbeat.pipeline.events.dropped)), 
  pipeline_acked_max = max(to_long(beat.stats.libbeat.pipeline.queue.acked)), 
  pipeline_acked_min = min(to_long(beat.stats.libbeat.pipeline.queue.acked)) 
  BY time_bucket = DATE_TRUNC(1 minute, @timestamp), elastic_agent.id, component.id
| EVAL 
  events_dropped = events_dropped_max - events_dropped_min, 
  events_acked = pipeline_acked_max - pipeline_acked_min
| EVAL drop_pct = CASE(
  events_acked > 0, events_dropped / events_acked, 
  0
)
| WHERE drop_pct >= 0.05
| KEEP drop_pct, elastic_agent.id, component.id
